bibl.author: Matsui, Dai
bibl.title: Mongoru jidai Uigurisutan no zeieki seido to chōzei shisutemu. (Engl. Nebentitel: Taxation and Tax-collecting systems in Uiguristan under Mongol Rule.)

imprint.title: Kōichi Matsuda (ed.): Hikokutōshiryō no sōgōtekibunseki ni yoru Mongoruteikoku, Genchō no seiji, keizai shisutemu no kisotekikenkyū. (Engl. Nebentitel: Research on Political and Economic Systems under Mongol Rule. Report of the Scientific Research Project Grant-in Aid, Japan Society for Promotion of Science, Basic Research (B) (1))
